types:type.name: customer
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type customer = {| customerID: String, firstName: String, lastName: String, displayName: String, address: {| addressLine1: String, addressLine2: String, city: String, state: String, zipCode: String, country: String |}, phone: String, email: String, ssn: String, dateOfBirth: String |} {"example": "{\\\"customerID\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"Molly\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Mule\\\",\\\"displayName\\\":\\\"Molly the Mule\\\",\\\"address\\\":{\\\"addressLine1\\\":\\\"123 Street\\\",\\\"addressLine2\\\":\\\"Apt.#3D\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"San Francisco\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"California\\\",\\\"zipCode\\\":\\\"94110\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"United States\\\"},\\\"phone\\\":\\\"415-000-0000\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"molly@mulesoft.com\\\",\\\"ssn\\\":\\\"321-654-0987\\\",\\\"dateOfBirth\\\":\\\"1990-09-04\\\"}"}
